# Station Conduct Guidelines Prospect Sector does **not** use Space Law, Security forces, brig systems, nor punitive crime codes. Instead, the station runs on **cooperative conduct**, **leadership guidance**, and **roleplay-driven conflict resolution**.
These guidelines explain how the crew should safely handle disputes, detainment, dangerous equipment, and emergencies in a game mode with **no antagonists** and **no police structure**.
These guidelines are **not server rules**, but some rules reference proper station conduct and require Command and crew to behave within these expectations.
[color=#a4885c]## General Philosophy[/color] - The station is a **civilian, cooperative environment**. - There is no police force and no “criminal code.” - Conflicts are resolved through RP and escalation rules. - Restraint is rare and only for **immediate threats**. - Hostile NPC fauna and environmental hazards—not players—are the true dangers.
[color=#a4885c]## Temporary Restraint & Containment[/color] Crew may temporarily restrain someone **only** when: - A player is actively attacking others - A player is creating immediate, serious risk to infrastructure - Someone is violently escalating without RP justification - A character is mentally unstable (RP) and must be contained for safety
Guidelines: - Use the **minimum necessary restraint**. - Remove restraints once the situation is safe. - Provide medical attention if needed. - Long-term confinement **does not exist** IC in Prospect Sector.
[color=#a4885c]## Treatment of Restrained Crew[/color] Anyone temporarily detained retains basic rights: - Access to medical care - Access to communication unless abused - Retention of gear unless it is dangerous - Safe, non-isolated holding spaces (an office or med room)
If the area becomes unsafe, relocate the person to a secure but humane space.
[color=#a4885c]## Searches[/color] Searches may occur **only with a clear IC reason**, such as: - Suspected dangerous equipment in a civilian area - Erratic or hazardous behavior - Someone refusing to store expedition weapons outside the Terradrop zone
Guidelines: - Searches require **reasonable cause**. - Only dangerous or misused items may be confiscated. - All harmless items must be returned. - Crew may refuse a search in normal areas unless they pose active danger.
[color=#a4885c]## Dangerous Equipment Control[/color] - Expedition weapons, tools, and armor may be openly carried **only near the Terradrop** and expedition prep areas. - Elsewhere on the station, all dangerous gear must be **stored** (backpack, locker, personal storage). - Open-carry outside the expedition zone is prohibited unless responding to an **active emergency**.
If someone refuses to store dangerous items and becomes a hazard, temporary containment or item confiscation is valid RP.
[color=#a4885c]## Implants & Medical Procedures[/color] Prospect Sector has **no punitive implant system**. All implantation must follow these rules: - Only medical or research implants may be used - No forced implants without OOC consent - No mindshields, trackers, or “law enforcement” implants - Extraction or implantation is never used as punishment
[color=#a4885c]## Punishments & Consequences[/color] There are **no brig sentences**, **no timers**, and **no executions** IC.
Allowed consequences: - [color=#a4885c]Warning:[/color] Clear RP instructions to stop harmful behavior - [color=#a4885c]Confiscation:[/color] Temporarily removing dangerous or misused items - [color=#a4885c]Demotion:[/color] Removing a role or access if job gear is misused - [color=#a4885c]Relocation:[/color] Moving someone to a safe space to cool down
Demotions require: - Command (Station Lead or department head) approval - Clear IC justification - Proper RP communication
[color=#a4885c]## Handling Severe Disruption[/color] When a player repeatedly disrupts station operations: - Command should intervene via conversation or demotion - Crew may restrain temporarily - If behavior continues, contact admins via ahelp
Long-term confinement is **not** a valid IC solution.
[color=#a4885c]## No Major Punishments[/color] - No executions - No permanent confinement - No forced exile - These exist **only as admin OOC actions**, never IC procedures
[color=#a4885c]## No Crime Listing[/color] Because there is no law system or security structure, there is **no crime list**. The only expectations are: - Cooperate - Maintain the station - Protect progression - Keep the environment safe and roleplay-appropriate
